languages.text: При помощи бинокулярного наблюдательного механизма Лорд-капитан можно лично корректировать огонь макропушек прямо с мостика, если е{mf|му|й} будет угодно возглавить оборону судна от многочисленных пустотных угроз.

This binocular observation mechanism allows the Lord Captain to calibrate macro-cannon fire directly from the bridge should {mf|he|she} see fit to take personal command when defending the ship from the many threats of the void.
languages.original_text: При помощи бинокулярного наблюдательного механизма Лорд-капитан можно лично корректировать огонь макропушек прямо с мостика, если е{mf|му|й} будет угодно возглавить оборону судна от многочисленных пустотных угроз.

traits.locale_text: This binocular observation mechanism allows the Lord Captain to calibrate macro-cannon fire directly from the bridge should {mf|he|she} see fit to take personal command when defending the ship from the many threats of the void.

This binocular observation mechanism allows the Lord Captain to calibrate macro-cannon fire directly from the bridge should {mf|he|she} see fit to take personal command when defending the ship from the many threats of the void.

This binocular observation mechanism allows the Lord Captain to calibrate macro-cannon fire directly from the bridge should {mf|he|she} see fit to take personal command when defending the ship from the many threats of the void.

languages.text: Der Lord Captain wird es gelegentlich für nötig halten, das Schiff selbst gegen die vielen Gefahren der Leere zu verteidigen. Dieser binokulare Beobachtungsmechanismus gestattet es ihm, das Feuer der Makrokanone direkt von der Brücke aus zu kalibrieren.
languages.original_text: This binocular observation mechanism allows the Lord Captain to calibrate macro-cannon fire directly from the bridge should {mf|he|she} see fit to take personal command when defending the ship from the many threats of the void.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain wird es gelegentlich für nötig halten, das Schiff selbst gegen die vielen Gefahren der Leere zu verteidigen. Dieser binokulare Beobachtungsmechanismus gestattet es ihm, das Feuer der Makrokanone direkt von der Brücke aus zu kalibrieren.

languages.text: Grâce à ce mécanisme d'observation binoculaire, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} peut ajuster les tirs des macro-canons directement depuis la passerelle {mf|s'il|si elle} souhaite prendre en main la défense du navire contre les nombreuses menaces du vide.
languages.original_text: This binocular observation mechanism allows the Lord Captain to calibrate macro-cannon fire directly from the bridge should {mf|he|she} see fit to take personal command when defending the ship from the many threats of the void.

traits.locale_text: Grâce à ce mécanisme d'observation binoculaire, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} peut ajuster les tirs des macro-canons directement depuis la passerelle {mf|s'il|si elle} souhaite prendre en main la défense du navire contre les nombreuses menaces du vide.

languages.text: 这种双筒式目镜可以让领主舰长直接从舰桥上对宏炮进行校准，对虚空舰的相关操作亲自下达命令，保护舰船免受来自虚空的诸多威胁。
languages.original_text: This binocular observation mechanism allows the Lord Captain to calibrate macro-cannon fire directly from the bridge should {mf|he|she} see fit to take personal command when defending the ship from the many threats of the void.

traits.locale_text: 这种双筒式目镜可以让领主舰长直接从舰桥上对宏炮进行校准，对虚空舰的相关操作亲自下达命令，保护舰船免受来自虚空的诸多威胁。

languages.text: Este mecanismo de observación binocular permite a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán calibrar los disparos de macrocañones desde el puente si desea dirigir personalmente la defensa de la nave contra las amenazas del vacío.
languages.original_text: This binocular observation mechanism allows the Lord Captain to calibrate macro-cannon fire directly from the bridge should {mf|he|she} see fit to take personal command when defending the ship from the many threats of the void.

traits.locale_text: Este mecanismo de observación binocular permite a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán calibrar los disparos de macrocañones desde el puente si desea dirigir personalmente la defensa de la nave contra las amenazas del vacío.

languages.text: この双眼タイプの観察用機械は、ロード・キャプテンが自ら指揮を取るに相応しいタイミングだと感じて、ヴォイドのあらゆる脅威から船を守るとき、ブリッジから直接マクロキャノンの砲火を調整できる。
languages.original_text: This binocular observation mechanism allows the Lord Captain to calibrate macro-cannon fire directly from the bridge should {mf|he|she} see fit to take personal command when defending the ship from the many threats of the void.

traits.locale_text: この双眼タイプの観察用機械は、ロード・キャプテンが自ら指揮を取るに相応しいタイミングだと感じて、ヴォイドのあらゆる脅威から船を守るとき、ブリッジから直接マクロキャノンの砲火を調整できる。

languages.text: Bu dürbünlü gözlem mekanizması sayesinde Lord Kaptan, öteboyuttaki birçok tehdide karşı geminin savunmasını üstlenmek istediği takdirde makro topların atışlarını doğrudan köprüden kalibre edebilir.
languages.original_text: This binocular observation mechanism allows the Lord Captain to calibrate macro-cannon fire directly from the bridge should {mf|he|she} see fit to take personal command when defending the ship from the many threats of the void.
